ygData.subject: Re: Language
ygData.msgSnippet: What about magic users??? what lang are they in... I know Wiz use runes and necro use words. what do mages use?
ygData.messageBody:
What about magic users??? what lang are they in...

I know Wiz use runes
and necro use words.
what do mages use?
